name: Parallel Duo Dungeon: Unbalenced and Unloaded Game Jam Edition
name_original: Parallel Duo Dungeon: Unbalenced and Unloaded Game Jam Edition
description:
Greetings! We are Balloon Co. [gaming division] and this is no ordinary game.

This is the baby digital child of Balloon Co.'s very first game jam! And just like parents of newborns, us, the very many parents and legal guardians, are running off the opposite of what sleep is! But we press on, in order to give YOU, the player, a description of this game so that you can answer the ultimate question: "Is this game worth your time?"

AND SO HERE IS THAT DESCRIPTION.

~This is a game made for 2 people to play together, but a single person can still play it. It is worth your time.

QUESTION ANSWERED! Now you are good to go! If you like playing games without having any idea what's going on, download that sweet .exe, but if you want to understand how it works. our lawyers prepared a .txt file for you to download and read.

Also, our lawyers say that our investors would prefer we called this a "proof of concept" rather than a a game, but it has a middle, and end and is complete and winnable, so we are going to DISREGARD THAT ADVICE WE HIRED THEM TO GIVE US.  (PS. beginnings are overrated).
